name: ChristmasHourglass
0:
”Alexa, open christmas hourglass”
”Alexa, start christmas hourglass”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: christmas hourglass
des:
Ho, ho, ho! Happy Christmas season!
Count down with your family and friends for a special Christmas event! Open the skill and ask Alexa for one of the countdowns. Alexa will play the custom intro message and the countdown and then play a fun sound effect.
Notes: If you want to suggest more countdowns, you can do so by clicking "Send Feedback" at the bottom of the skill page. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
